ca.ualberta.cs.drivr

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.MapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.akexorcist.googledirection.DirectionCallback

    public class MapController
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.akexorcist.googledirection.DirectionCallback
    Created by justin on 09/11/16. A class for Modifying the google map Uses a open source library to assist with polyline route drawing
    See Also:
    https://github.com/akexorcist/Android-GoogleDirectionLibrary, DirectionCallback
